select t1.item_id,t1.item_guige,t1.item_yanse,t1.open_id,t1.shuliang,t1.del_flg,t1.c_date,t1.c_user,t1.u_date,t1.u_user,t2.item_name, t3.end_price_type,t3.sale_price,t3.item_guige,t3.guige_text,t3.item_yanse,t3.yanse_text,t4.path,t3.shuliang as kucun from t_cart t1 INNER JOIN t_item t2 on t1.item_id=t2.item_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '0' THEN t31.price WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '1' THEN t31.price_huiyuan WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '7' THEN t31.price_huodong WHEN DATE_FORMAT(t31.huodong_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN t31.price_huodong ELSE t31.price_huiyuan END AS sale_price, CASE WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '0' THEN t31.huodong_flg WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '1' THEN t31.huodong_flg WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '7' THEN t31.huodong_flg WHEN DATE_FORMAT(t31.huodong_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN t31.huodong_flg ELSE '1' END AS end_price_type ,item_id, item_guige, item_yanse, guige_text , yanse_text, shuliang, price, price_huiyuan, price_huodong , huodong_date, huodong_flg, zhongliang, del_flg, c_date , c_user, u_date, u_user FROM t_item_detail t31 ) t3 on t1.item_id=t3.item_id and t1.item_guige=t3.item_guige and t1.item_yanse=t3.item_yanse INNER JOIN t_item_picture t4 on t1.item_id = t4.item_id
where t4.picture_type='3' and t4.del_flg='0' and t1.open_id=#{openId} and t2.del_flg='0' and t2.shangjia_flg='1'

select t1.item_id,t1.item_guige,t1.item_yanse,t1.open_id,t1.shuliang,t1.del_flg,t1.c_date,t1.c_user,t1.u_date,t1.u_user,t2.item_name, t3.end_price_type,t3.sale_price,t3.guige_text,t3.yanse_text,t4.path,t3.shuliang as kucun,t2.shangjia_flg, t2.baoyou_flg,t2.`owner`,t2.from_area,t6.region_name as from_name, #{param2} as to_area,t7.region_name as to_name,t5.price as youfei,t5.price_plus as youfei_plus, t8.zhongliangTotal,
CASE WHEN t2.baoyou_flg='1' THEN 0 ELSE t5.price + ceil((t8.zhongliangTotal-1))*t5.price_plus END AS group_youfei from t_cart t1 INNER JOIN t_item t2 on t1.item_id=t2.item_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '0' THEN t31.price WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '1' THEN t31.price_huiyuan WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '7' THEN t31.price_huodong WHEN DATE_FORMAT(t31.huodong_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN t31.price_huodong ELSE t31.price_huiyuan END AS sale_price, CASE WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '0' THEN t31.huodong_flg WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '1' THEN t31.huodong_flg WHEN t31.huodong_flg = '7' THEN t31.huodong_flg WHEN DATE_FORMAT(t31.huodong_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN t31.huodong_flg ELSE '1' END AS end_price_type ,item_id, item_guige, item_yanse, guige_text , yanse_text, shuliang, price, price_huiyuan, price_huodong , huodong_date, huodong_flg, zhongliang, del_flg, c_date , c_user, u_date, u_user FROM t_item_detail t31 ) t3 on t1.item_id=t3.item_id and t1.item_guige=t3.item_guige and t1.item_yanse=t3.item_yanse INNER JOIN t_item_picture t4 on t1.item_id = t4.item_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_wuliu t5 on t5.from_area = t2.from_area and t5.to_area = #{param2} left outer join t_region t6 on t6.region_id = t2.from_area left outer join t_region t7 on t7.region_id = t5.to_area left outer join (
SELECT t21.`owner`,t21.from_area,sum(t11.shuliang*t31.zhongliang) as zhongliangTotal FROM t_cart t11 INNER JOIN t_item t21 ON t11.item_id =t21.item_id INNER JOIN t_item_detail t31 ON t11.item_id =t31.item_id AND t11.item_guige=t31.item_guige AND t11.item_yanse=t31.item_yanse WHERE t11.open_id=#{param1} and t21.baoyou_flg!='1' GROUP BY t21.`owner` ,t21.from_area ) t8 on t2.`owner` = t8.`owner` and t2.from_area =t8.from_area
where t4.picture_type='3' and t1.open_id=#{param1} and t1.del_flg='1'
